pkgmetadata.longdescription: Left-Truncated Mixtures of Gamma, Weibull, and Lognormal Distributions // Mixture modelling of one-dimensional data using combinations of left-truncated Gamma, Weibull, and Lognormal Distributions. Blostein, Martin Miljkovic, Tatjana. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.insmatheco.2018.12.001.
